price: 62.Kaadu Yalli ken (koros kinnuk) seecah yan ayrôy (Qhiyaamah ayrô kinnuk) Yot agleytiitih haak sugten Yallittey nee qokle-lc как axcuk sugteeni annih teetiiy keenik iyya!
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُنَادِيهِمۡ فَيَقُولُ أَيۡنَ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ كُنتُمۡ تَزۡعُمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.
